programme.title: Panama treaty agreed
programme.short_synopsis: Triumph for Carter as Senate approve Panama treaty.
programme.medium_synopsis: Casting vote saves Panama treaty after 13 years of negotiation over future of the canal.
programme.long_synopsis:
Casting vote saves Panama treaty after 13 years of negotiation over future of the canal.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
